code: import React,{useState}from'react';import styles from'../../styles/projectcode.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DogYears=()=>{const[humanAge,setHumanAge]=useState('');const[dogYears,setDogYears]=useState(null);const handleConvert=()=>{const humanValue=parseFloat(humanAge);if(isNaN(humanValue)){alert('Please enter a valid number');return;}let dogValue=0;if(humanValue<2){dogValue=humanValue*10.5;}else{dogValue=(humanValue-2)*4+21;}setDogYears(dogValue);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.landing,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Dog Years Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.main,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Enter your human age:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:humanAge,onChange:e=>setHumanAge(e.target.value)})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleConvert,children:"Convert"}),dogYears&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.results,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Dog years:"})," ",dogYears]})})]});};export default DogYears;
